subject: Missing components, order: SSN2912
description_text: Hi, i've just received the pedals but it is missing the haptic reactors and the mountings, i believe it was sent the package with only the pedals.

conversations.body_text: Hi Caio Semensato,    This is your logistics tracking link:  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6045963618741

Is it a different delivery company delivering the haptics?

Get Outlook for Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>
________________________________
Yes, the haptics ship from China.

Can you help me locate it, ireland is not big, its been a week since it arrived in Ireland and i have no ideia where it is or when it will arrive

Get Outlook for Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>
________________________________
Hi Caio Semensato,     We are pressing the logistics provider

Thank you, much appreciated

Get Outlook for Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>
________________________________
Hi Caio Semensato,    I see the package tracking has been updated and should be delivered to you today.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6045963618741
